meanings.sent1: She was oversolicitous about her friend's well-being, always checking in on them.
meanings.sent2: The oversolicitous nurse made sure to double-check every detail of the patient's care.
meanings.sent3: The oversolicitous mother packed her child's lunch, backpack, and even their favorite toy, just in case.
meanings.sent4: His oversolicitous behavior towards his plants led to them being overwatered and unhealthy.
meanings.sent5: The oversolicitous teacher knew every student's favorite subject and made sure to include it in the lesson plan.

meanings.sent1: The oversolicitous neighbor always offered to help with any task, no matter how small.
meanings.sent2: Being oversolicitous, she insisted on driving her friend to the doctor's appointment.
meanings.sent3: The oversolicitous dog kept bringing its owner toys, worried they might be bored.
meanings.sent4: Her oversolicitous nature extended to her plants, as she meticulously cared for each one.
meanings.sent5: The oversolicitous student always made sure to remind the teacher of upcoming assignments.

meanings.definition: Overly anxious or worried about someone or something
meanings.sent1: Feeling oversolicitous, she couldn't shake off the worry about her upcoming presentation.
meanings.sent2: His oversolicitous behavior towards his grades led to constant stress and sleepless nights.
meanings.sent3: The oversolicitous cat meowed loudly until its owner returned home, fearing abandonment.
meanings.sent4: The oversolicitous driver checked the rearview mirror every few seconds, anxious about other cars.
meanings.sent5: The oversolicitous student chewed on their pencil during the exam, nervous about the time limit.
